vendor_name: Shangri-La’s Hambantota Golf Resort and Spa
title: Shangri-La Sri Lanka Oceanfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails
description:
One of Sri Lanka's most lavish addresses, this Shangri-La beachfront oasis compromises exceptional facilities for adults and children alike, all with breathtaking views over the Indian Ocean. 

Savour signature fine dining across four internationally-inspired eateries, including Sera restaurant's mouthwatering Southeast Asian hawker dishes, Sri Lankan and global fare cooked in mesmerising show kitchens at Bojunhala and tipples at the oceanfront Gimanhala Lounge.

Melt away with an award-winning treatment at the spa or, for the adventurous traveller, practice your swing at the Rodney Wright-designed golf course, conquer the seven-meter-high trapeze and let the little ones loose at the ultimate kids club and waterpark.
offer_address: Sittrakala Watta, Chithragala, Ambalantota 82100, Sri Lanka

vendor_name: Shangri-La’s Hambantota Golf Resort and Spa
title: Sri Lanka Five-Star Beachfront Shangri-La Luxury with Daily Dining & Cocktails
description: Experience world-renowned five-star service on the breathtaking South Coast of Sri Lanka at Shangri-La's Hambantota Golf Resort & Spa. Consider Hambantota your gateway to the world-famous Yala National Park, where nature enthusiasts can spot wild leopards, elephants, colourful birdlife and more. Its proximity to the Indian Ocean also makes it perfect for beachside fun and trying delicious fresh seafood. Spanning an incredible 58 hectares, this award-winning resort features Sri Lanka's only resort golf course, an 18-hole experience designed by Rodney Wright. When you're not practising your swing, let relaxation take over at Chi Ayurveda Spa or indulge at the resort's four restaurants and bars. For little guests, there's a kids' club, seven-metre trapeze, outdoor waterpark and three swimming pools. Whether you come for nature, dining or impeccable five-star Shangri-La service, you'll leave with memories to last a lifetime.
offer_address: Sittrakala Watta, Chithragala, Ambalantota 82100, Sri Lanka

vendor_name: Shangri-La’s Hambantota Golf Resort and Spa
title: Sri Lanka Shangri-La Luxury with 18-Hole Golf Course
description: Golfing enthusiasts will delight in a stay at Shangri-La Hambantota, home to a stunning 18-hole golf course offering exceptional views of the Indian Ocean. Even if you don't take advantage of the Rodney Wright-designed course, there's plenty to keep the whole family occupied. Drop the kids off at the Cool Zone Kids’ Club, where they'll have access to an outdoor waterpark and fun-filled activities, while you get pampered at Chi Ayurveda Spa or enjoy sundowners at Gimanhala Lounge. There are three other incredible restaurants to dine at, as well as three swimming pools and a fitness centre. For the adventurous traveller, try out the seven-metre-high trapeze or join a nature walk along the winding trails surrounding the resort. Venturing out the hotel is a wild experience, with Sri Lanka's three famous national parks - Yala, Udawalawe and Lunugamvehera National Parks - all about an hour's drive away.
offer_address: Sittrakala Estate, Chithragala, Ambalantota 82100 Sri Lanka
